Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Chemistry in Cancer Research (CICR) Working Group. The 2022 CICR Town Hall will feature three presentations and debate on current and controversial topics on the theme of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in Drug Discovery. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
Location: Grand Ballroom D, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
SearchResultBody: TM04. Chemistry in Cancer Research (CICR) Working Group Town Hall and Networking Reception
